about.title: About Me
about.description: Full Stack Developer specializing in React and Next.js with 18+ months intensive experience. Capable of building complete end-to-end web applications, worked on healthcare platforms serving 20,000+ weekly users and built applications with Lighthouse 99/100 scores.
about.description_2: Currently founder of Nixi Web Lab, delivering complete end-to-end web solutions: from UX/UI design in Figma to full-stack development, SEO, and deployment. Specialized in performance-optimized bilingual web applications with Next.js, React, and TypeScript, achieving <1s load times.
about.description_3: Based in Granada, working with international clients. Fluent in English, Spanish, and Portuguese. I combine technical expertise with project management, having led cross-functional teams of up to 30 people in international projects.

job1.title: Founder & Web Developer
job1.description: Founded independent web development consultancy specializing in performance-optimized, bilingual web applications for small-to-medium businesses. Architected 3 production-grade Next.js applications with Lighthouse scores 99/100, featuring internationalization (EN/ES), SEO optimization, and <1s load times. Delivered end-to-end solutions encompassing UX/UI design, responsive development, accessibility compliance, and technical SEO. Established scalable workflow using Next.js 14+ App Router, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and next-intl with Vercel deployment.

job2.title: Frontend Developer
job2.description: Contributed to NightOwl healthcare platform serving 20,000+ weekly users across 3 international markets within globally distributed team. Increased test coverage from 2% to 35% in 5 days by authoring 1,000+ unit tests with Jest, significantly improving code reliability. Introduced end-to-end testing infrastructure using Playwright, establishing comprehensive quality assurance processes. Served as rotating Scrum Master coordinating sprint ceremonies and managing team workflow in Jira/Confluence. Managed production incident response through PagerDuty on-call rotation, troubleshooting critical issues across cross-functional teams. Led 3 production releases independently, coordinating with backend teams across 4 time zones.

job3.title: Teaching Assistant | Full Stack Developer
job3.description: Mentored 50+ students across two cohorts in intensive full-stack development bootcamp, achieving 90% course completion rate through structured support and personalized guidance. Delivered technical instruction on React, JavaScript, Python, Flask, and SQLAlchemy. Created educational repositories, coding exercises, and presentation materials reinforcing core programming concepts. Delivered technical lectures on React hooks, state management, database design, and API development.

job4.title: Full Stack Developer Intern
job4.description: Developed full-stack features for web platform using Elixir and Phoenix framework, focusing on backend optimization and real-time interactions. Implemented full-stack functionalities increasing user engagement by 35% through optimized data processing and interactive UI. Developed responsive UI components using Phoenix LiveView and TailwindCSS, enhancing user experience across devices. Optimized database queries with PostgreSQL, reducing response times and improving application scalability.

project1.title: CycleMap - Global Bike Sharing Explorer
project1.description: Interactive web application to explore and discover 600+ bicycle sharing networks worldwide on an interactive map. Users can find stations, check real-time availability, and plan their rides. Features detail view with sortable stations table, marker clustering, 'Near Me' geolocation, search and country filters with URL-persisted state, pagination, and fully responsive design. Static generation with ISR for 35 popular networks. Lighthouse: Performance 96-100, Accessibility 96-100, Best Practices 100, SEO 100.

project2.title: Fields Barbers - Premium Barbershop Website
project2.description: Complete website for premium barbershop in Córdoba with online booking system integrated with Booksy. Developed a modern and elegant web experience with minimalist design, sophisticated palette with gold accents, and bilingual support (ES/EN). Features service catalog with pricing, schedules, Google Maps integration, SEO optimized with Schema.org, and <1s load times. Designed to communicate professionalism and accessibility to both local and international clientele.

project3.title: El Higo - Mediterranean Restaurant Website
project3.description: Complete website for Mediterranean restaurant in Granada's Albaicín neighborhood. Developed a warm and elegant web experience that reflects the restaurant's identity with complete interactive menu, reservation system integrated with WhatsApp and TheFork, featured patio section, customer testimonials, and bilingual support (ES/EN). Responsive design with sophisticated typography, high-quality imagery, SEO optimized with Schema.org, and excellent load times. The website captures the essence of authentic Granada cuisine in an intimate setting.

project4.title: EquiRoster - AI-Powered Scheduling Platform
project4.description: Founded and led AI-powered workforce scheduling platform for restaurants and hospitality businesses, managing team of 4 developers. Designed complete system architecture and UX flows using Figma/Draw.io, translating real-world hospitality challenges into technical solutions. Developed custom AI algorithms for workforce optimization without external API dependencies. Validated product-market fit through interviews with 10+ restaurant managers. Full-stack solution with React TypeScript and Python/SQLAlchemy.

project5.title: VSCode Shortcuts - Interactive Learning App
project5.description: Interactive web application designed for full-stack development bootcamp students to learn and practice 122 VS Code keyboard shortcuts and 51 Git commands. Features practice mode with random questions and instant feedback, progress tracking, favorites system, real-time search, category filters, Windows/Mac toggle, and automatic bilingual support (EN/ES). All persistence via LocalStorage.
